translations: 笨拙的（ clumsy 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: SHIFTING consumer tastes and changing regulations have forced even the clumsiest of retail behemoths to be more fleet-footed.
sentences.translation: 随着顾客口味的改变以及业内规则变化，即便最糟糕的零售巨兽也飞速发展起来。

sentences.sentence: The clumsiest most economic object the holes pierced in an oil can to make a fire a folding lantern a ball of string or a floor tile.
sentences.translation: 最粗糙、最廉价的东西、一个开几个孔来点火的油罐、一只折叠手提灯、—团线或一块地砖。
